techstack.resume: Technologies I've been working with recently

projects.title: Projects
projects.resume: Some apps that I've built so far
projects.coffeeConnoisseur: Coffee store finder application that shows the coffee stores nearby using the Foursquare API with online database integration that allow users to evalluate, vote and favourite their favourite coffee shops.
projects.netflixClone: Simple application clonning some basic features of Netflix. The videos are fetched from YouTube API, includes a login system without password and is integrated with a online database that allow the user to favorite videos.
projects.roboFriends: Simple application to exercise the features of React Hooks.
projects.quotesCarroussel: Simple and basic application to exercise the primary functionalities of DOM manipulation using vanilla Javascript. This is my first personal project in web development.
projects.airBnbClone: A clone of first pages of AirBnb website consuming API services for geolocalization and interactive maps to exercise functionalities of Next.js and Tailwind stylesheet framework.
projects.pokedex: Simple application to exercise the use of APIs and basic functionalities of Vue.js and Bulma stylesheet framework.
projects.fasteng: Professional application for automating calculations, tests and dosages for soil and pavement engineering processes. In this application the biggest challenge is to reproduce advanced engineering calculations to facilitate this work.
projects.nullbank: Simple landing page to exercise concepts of HTML and CSS such as semantics, responsiveness and flexbox/grid.
projects.plantpeace: Simple application with registration and authentication of users via Clerk and persistence of data in a fictional database using json-server.
projects.dripculture: Simple application with registration and authentication of users via Clerk and persistence of data in a fictional database using json-server. Simulation of online purchase using the Via Cep API and using state management with Redux.

resume.title: FULLSTACK DEVELOPER
resume.carreer-transition-desc: I'm looking for a more concise placement in the job market.
resume.insertion-oportunity-desc: I'm looking for positions as Junior or trainees.
resume.learn-specialize-desc: I look for practical opportunities to develop myself as a specialist in a priority technology for the company.
resume.locale: Paid internship developing the front and backend of a real estate listing website from scratch with Next js, Nest js and MongoDB.
resume.jbr: Paid internship in a fullstack migration and development team for a production application with the aim of automating laboratory processes in the civil engineering area.
resume.painter-desc: Independent work in a building and home painting team involving planning, budgeting, purchasing and maintenance.
resume.janitor-desc: Cleaning and maintenance of industrial facilities and equipment in large plants.
resume.general-services-desc: Cleaning and maintenance of building and household facilities in medium-sized condominiums.
resume.seller-desc: Sales and prospecting of customers in an electronics store in a shopping center.
resume.education-desc: Bachelor's degree in systems analysis and development
